document.full_text: the photograph shows a french rafale warplane at the mitiga air base outside tripoli. a small crowd of men, women and children mill around the fighter, its tail fin lit up by the north african sun.
document.title: special report: how libya is a showcase in the new arms race
lines_and_colors: the photograph shows a french rafale warplane at the mitiga air base outside tripoli. a small crowd of men, women and children mill around the fighter, its tail fin lit up by the north african sun.
